Body:
"""Test clock integration."""
clock = CountClock()
clock.counter = 10
daq = DataAcquisitionClient(device=_MockDevice(data=self.mock_data,
    channels=self.mock_channels), buffer_name='buffer_client_test_clock.db',
    raw_data_file_name=None, delete_archive=True, clock=clock)
with daq:
    time.sleep(0.1)
data = daq.get_data()
self.assertTrue(len(data) > 0)
for i, record in enumerate(data):
    self.assertEqual(record.timestamp, float(i + 1))
daq.cleanup()
